text.div:
AlvearieFHIRImplementationGuide

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://ibm.com/fhir/cdm/ImplementationGuide/alvearie.fhir.ig

Alvearie FHIR Profiles

resource.name: CDM Address
resource.description: Address wtih common extensions

resource.name: CDM Appointment
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an appointment

resource.name: CDM CarePlan
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a care plan

resource.name: CDM Claim
resource.description: A provider issued list of professional services and products which have been provided, or are to be provided, to a patient which is sent to an insurer for reimbursement. The CDMClaim profile extends the base FHIR Claim resource with additional details.

resource.name: CDM Claim Drug
resource.description: The CDMClaimDrug profile extends the base CDMClaim profile with additional details that are specific to pharmacy claims

resource.name: CDM Claim Facility
resource.description: The CDMClaimFacility profile extends the base CDMClaim profile with additional details that are specific to facility claims

resource.name: CDM Claim Professional
resource.description: The CDMClaimProfessional profile extends the CDMClaimResponse resource with additional adjudication details that are specific to professional claims.

resource.name: CDM Claim Response
resource.description: This resource provides the adjudication details from the processing of a Claim resource. The CDMClaimResponse profile extends the base FHIR ClaimResponse resource with additional adjudication details.

resource.name: CDM Claim Response Drug
resource.description: This resource provides the adjudication details from the processing of a Claim resource. The CDMClaimResponseDrug profile extends the CDMClaimResponse resource with additional adjudication details that are specific to pharmacy claims.

resource.name: CDM Communication
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a communication

resource.name: Communication Contact Point
resource.description: Contact point extended with country and phone ext for communications

resource.name: CDM CommunicationRequest
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a communication request

resource.name: CDM Condition
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a condition

resource.name: CDM ContactPoint
resource.description: ContactPoint wtih common extensions

resource.name: CDM Coverage
resource.description: Describes the healthcare benefit coverage of a member as it relates to a health plan. Coverage determines how the health care products and services the member receives may be paid. The CDMCoverage profile extends the base FHIR Coverage resource with additional benefit coverage details.

resource.name: CDM Detected Issue
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a detected issue

resource.name: CDM Eligibility
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an eligibility record

resource.name: CDM Encounter
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an encounter

resource.name: CDM Identifier
resource.description: CDM identifier with support for encrypted value

resource.name: CDM Insurance Plan
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an insurance plan

resource.name: CDM Library
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a library

resource.name: CDM Location
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a location

resource.name: Location Matching - Match Location
resource.description: Match location record created when matched locations are found, containing links to the source location resources that were matched

resource.name: CDM Match Patient
resource.description: Match patient record created when matched patients are found, containing links to the source patient resources that were matched

resource.name: CDM Match Practitioner
resource.description: Match practitioner record created when matched practitioners are found, containing links to the source practitioner resources that were matched

resource.name: CDM Observation
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an observation

resource.name: CDM Organization
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a organization

resource.name: CDM Organization Affiliation
resource.description: IBM® Health Data Connect organization affiliation with versioned hierarchy levels used to relate parent and child organizations

resource.name: CDM Patient
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a patient

resource.name: CDM Practitioner
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a practitioner

resource.name: CDM Practitioner Bundle
resource.description: IBM® Health Data Connect bundle used to package Common Data Model practitioner resources for data ingestion

resource.name: CDM Procedure
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for a procedure

resource.name: CDM Service Request
resource.description: A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed. The CDMServiceRequest profile extends the base FHIR ServiceRequest resource with additional details.

resource.name: Care Gap Detected Issue
resource.description: Detected issues to record a history of open and closed care gaps identified for a patient over time.

resource.name: Engagement Communication
resource.description: This profile is a record of an engagement communication to a patient including successful, planned, and failed communications.

resource.name: Engagement CommunicationRequest
resource.description: This profile is a record of an engagement request for a communication to a patient.

resource.name: Fee for Value Initative
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model definition of what fields we currently define for an FFV initiative record

resource.name: Hierarchy Practitioner Role
resource.description: Practitioner role used to represent a hierarchy within an organization

resource.name: Measure Population Observation
resource.description: Observation created by IBM Health Data Connect to record measure populations for a patient over time

resource.name: ParameterDefinition With Default
resource.description: ParameterDefinition with optional detailt value

resource.name: ParameterDefinition With Value
resource.description: ParameterDefinition with the parameter value that was used

resource.name: Patient List
resource.description: A list of references to specific patients

resource.name: Practitioner List
resource.description: A list of references to specific practitioners

resource.name: Process Meta
resource.description: Data lineage meta with process extensions

resource.name: Quality Measure
resource.description: The quality measure profile is limited to measures with proportion and ratio scoring methods. The profile requires an initial population, denominator, and numerator in accordance with FHIR quality reporting guidelines. Measure population and measure population exclusions are not allowed.  The profile also supports care gap populations for additional use cases.

resource.name: Quality Measure List
resource.description: A list of references to specific measures

resource.name: Organization Quality Measure Report
resource.description: A quality measure report with an organizational focus

resource.name: Patient Quality Measure Report
resource.description: A quality measure report focused on a single patient

resource.name: Practitioner Quality Measure Report
resource.description: A quality measure report focused on practitioner performance

resource.name: Quality Measure Report
resource.description: An abstract quality measure report profile. This profile serves as the base for organizational, practitioner, and patient-focused quality measure reports.

resource.name: Quantity With Conversion
resource.description: Quantity with converted quanitity for standard unit values

resource.name: Reference With Code and Period
resource.description: A reference with one or more contextual codes and an optional period defining the time period in which the reference is valid

resource.name: Reference With Period
resource.description: A reference with a period defining the time period in which the reference is valid

resource.name: Work Address
resource.description: Physical work location or business address with CDM address extensions

resource.name: Age and Gender Groups
resource.description: Standard code for groupings that combine age and gender

resource.name: Age Group
resource.description: Standard code for age groupings

resource.name: Allowed Amount Inpatient (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount for an in-patient, in USD

resource.name: Allowed Amount Managing Physician (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount for the managing physician, in USD

resource.name: Assigned Practitioner
resource.description: The practitioner assigned to the patient

resource.name: Attributed Provider Reference with Period
resource.description: A reference to an attributed practitioner resource with a period defining the time period in which the attribution is valid

resource.name: Attribution Code
resource.description: FFV initiative attribution method code

resource.name: CanonicalMeasure
resource.description: Canonical reference to the specific version of the measure used to generate the resource.

resource.name: Capitated Service Indicator
resource.description: An indicator that this service (encounter record) was capitated

resource.name: CareGapComplianceEventDisplayName
resource.description: Text describing the treatment or compliance event required to close the care gap.  Should be suitable for display to patient.

resource.name: CareGapComplianceFrequency
resource.description: Text describing the frequency of the treatment or compliance event required to close the care gap.  Frequency should be suitable for display to patient.

resource.name: CareGapComplianceMet
resource.description: Indicates if the patient received the targeted treatment to close the care gap.

resource.name: Child Organization Hierarchy Level Description
resource.description: Description of the level of the child practitioner within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Child Organization Hierarchy Level Code
resource.description: Numeric level of the child practitioner within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Claim Adjustment Type
resource.description: The code for the claim's adjustment type

resource.name: Claim Group Identifier
resource.description: Group ID of the plan member. This ID associates the primary plan holder with any dependents.

resource.name: Claim Item Detail Classification
resource.description: Classification of the information contained in this claim item detail section

resource.name: Claim Response Benefit Plan
resource.description: The Benefit Plan on the claim item.

resource.name: Claim Response Item Status
resource.description: Payment status of claim item

resource.name: Claim Snapshot Provider Name
resource.description: The original provider name as reported on the claim

resource.name: Claim Snapshot Provider Zip Code
resource.description: The original provider postal code, as reported on the claim

resource.name: Claim Status
resource.description: Custom code for the claim status

resource.name: Communication Care Gap
resource.description: ID of care gap for which we are communicating

resource.name: Communication Contact
resource.description: Phone number, email, or address to contact

resource.name: Communication Language
resource.description: Language used for communication messaging content

resource.name: Communication Measure
resource.description: Reference to the measure that resulted in the communication

resource.name: Communication Mode
resource.description: Mode of communication (phone | sms | email | mail | chat)

resource.name: Communication On-Behalf Of
resource.description: Attributed provider, location, or organization communication is on-behalf of

resource.name: Communication Opt-Out
resource.description: Opt-out patient for communications by product and/or mode.

resource.name: Communication Outcome
resource.description: Vendor-specific communication response code or text

resource.name: Communication Payload Data
resource.description: Contains dynamic data elements and vendor / medium specific elements to be included in the message payload

resource.name: Communication Priority Sequence
resource.description: Priority of the communication request (1 = highest)

resource.name: Communication Product
resource.description: Product generating the communication

resource.name: Communication Reengagement
resource.description: Sequence for subsequent communication attempts to reengage the patient

resource.name: Communication Retry Limit
resource.description: Retry limit configuration, may vary by medium and vendor

resource.name: Communication Sent Time
resource.description: Time communication was attempted

resource.name: Communication Template
resource.description: ID or url reference to template to be used for communication

resource.name: Communication Vendor
resource.description: Vendor used to send the communication

resource.name: Company Code
resource.description: The company code of the subscriber as reported on the claim

resource.name: Compound Code
resource.description: Indicator of whether the product is a compound drug or not

resource.name: Conversation Type
resource.description: Type of conversation, used for ihe chat communications

resource.name: Converted Quantity
resource.description: Converted quantity expressed in standard unit value

resource.name: County Code
resource.description: The county code for the address

resource.name: Coverage Month
resource.description: The date which reflects the month of eligibility

resource.name: Default Value
resource.description: Default value for the parameter

resource.name: Documented Sex
resource.description: Sex coding indicated on the legal document

resource.name: Documented Source
resource.description: Source type of the legal document

resource.name: Documented System
resource.description: Source system or jurisdiction of the legal document

resource.name: Effective Period
resource.description: Effective period.

resource.name: Employee Business Unit
resource.description: The business unit of the subscriber as reported on the claim

resource.name: Employee Count
resource.description: A flag of the employees in the eligibility record. Each employee is identified with a value of 1. All others are given values of 0.

resource.name: Employee FTE Count
resource.description: The Full Time Equivalent calculation for the employee. Example 1: A full-time employee would have a value of 1. Example 2: A 20-hour per week employee would have a value of 0.5.

resource.name: Employee Hire Date
resource.description: The first date of employment for the employee

resource.name: Employee Status
resource.description: The code for the status of the employee

resource.name: Employee Termination Date
resource.description: The last date of employment for the employee

resource.name: Encrypted State
resource.description: Encrypted state

resource.name: Enrollment PCP
resource.description: Provider identifier of the primary care physician for the plan member

resource.name: Episode Admit Count
resource.description: Number of admissions related to the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Allowed Amount Outpatient (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount for an out-patient episode, in USD

resource.name: Episode Allowed Amount PCP (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount per episide for the primary care physician, in USD

resource.name: Episode Allowed Amount Primary Physician (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount per episide for the primary physician, in USD

resource.name: Episode Allowed Amount Rx (USD)
resource.description: Allowed amount per episode for the medications, in USD

resource.name: Episode Allowed Amount Total (USD)
resource.description: Total allowed amount per episode, in USD

resource.name: Episode Body System
resource.description: Body system related to the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Cost Scale
resource.description: Cost scale of the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Derived Code
resource.description: Derived code for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Derived Indicator
resource.description: Derived indicator for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Disease Stage Code
resource.description: Disease stage code for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Duration (Days)
resource.description: Duration of the episode of care, specified in days

resource.name: Episode Group Code
resource.description: Group code for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Primary Physician
resource.description: Primary physician associated with the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Procedure Type Code
resource.description: Primary procedure type AHRQ code for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Rx Count
resource.description: Count of medications for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Summary Group Code
resource.description: Summary group code for the episode of care

resource.name: Episode Use Scale
resource.description: Use scale for the episode of care

resource.name: FFV Schedule
resource.description: Schedule code for the FFV initiative

resource.name: Family Id
resource.description: The unique identifier for the subscriber (contract holder, employee) and the associated dependents

resource.name: Hierarchy Version Date
resource.description: Version date of the organinzational hierarchy represented

resource.name: Hierarchy VersionId
resource.description: Numeric version of the organinzational hierarchy represented

resource.name: Identified Pronouns
resource.description: Gender, typically described in terms of masculinity and femininity, is a social construction that varies across different cultures and over time.  This value is often used for identity purposes and should be collected directly from the patient.

resource.name: Industry Classification
resource.description: The industry classification code which can be based on the North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)

resource.name: Ingestion Batch Id
resource.description: The ID generated by an ingestion service. This represents a producer-submitted message collection

resource.name: Job Class Code
resource.description: Classifcation group of the job role of the employee, for example, Top Executives, Post-secondary teachers, and Engineers

resource.name: Job Title Code
resource.description: Detailed job title of the employee

resource.name: Language Rank
resource.description: Specify preferred order of language use (1 = highest)

resource.name: Legally Documented Sex
resource.description: Sex as defined or amended on the patient's legal documentation, for example a birth certificate or driver's license

resource.name: Local Number Of Units Per Service
resource.description: Customer-specific quantity of either services or units

resource.name: Local Race Code
resource.description: Customer-specific code for the race of the person

resource.name: Local Subscriber Relationship Code
resource.description: Customer-specific code for the relationship of the member to the subscriber

resource.name: Match Compared To
resource.description: Reference to the record that was compared for matching

resource.name: Match Confidence Code
resource.description: Confidence code for the match

resource.name: Confidence Score
resource.description: Confidence score for the match

resource.name: Match Criteria
resource.description: Criteria or algorythm used to identify the matched resource

resource.name: Match Detail
resource.description: Detailed match algorthm results used to match resources

resource.name: Match Method
resource.description: Method used to identify the matched resource

resource.name: Match Period
resource.description: Time period when match is valid

resource.name: MatchSourceReference
resource.description: Reference to the source resource that is matched

resource.name: Measure Parameter
resource.description: Defined parameter options implemented by the measure

resource.name: MeasureParameterValue
resource.description: Measure parameter value used to generate the measure report

resource.name: Measure Population Id
resource.description: Unique static identifier for the measure population that does not change between cohort engine runs. This is a user-friendly textual key (internal use only) that identifies a specific population. This id should be unique across all measures and should not change when a measure is versioned or when overrides are applied.

resource.name: Measure Report Assigned Practitioner
resource.description: The provider identifier of the physician(s) assigned to the rule measure using one of the physician attribution methods

resource.name: Measure Report Evidence
resource.description: Supporting evidence showing detailed data about why a patient qualified (or did not qualify) for measure rules

resource.name: Measure Report Evidence Population Id
resource.description: Population id of populations that reference or utilize the rule definition

resource.name: Measure Report Evidence Text
resource.description: Textual title or description of the rule definition within a measure report

resource.name: Measure Report Evidence Value
resource.description: Output value of rule definition within a measure report

resource.name: Measure Weight
resource.description: Measure Weight

resource.name: Medicare Indicator
resource.description: An indicator of Medicare coverage for the member

resource.name: Member Employee Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member is either an employee of the health plan, or the dependent of an employee of the health plan

resource.name: Network Id
resource.description: Customer-specific identifier of the patient provider network in which the member is enrolled

resource.name: Parameter Value
resource.description: Value that was used for the parameter

resource.name: Parent Organization Hierarchy Level Description
resource.description: Description of the level of the parent within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Parent Organization Hierarchy Level Code
resource.description: Numeric level of the parent within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Plan Employee Code
resource.description: Customer-specific code indicating whether the member is an employee of the health plan or the dependent of an employee of the health plan

resource.name: Practitioner Hierarchy Level Description
resource.description: Description of the level of the practitioner within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Practitioner Hierarchy Level Code
resource.description: Numeric level of the practitioner within the organinzational hierarchy

resource.name: Problem Clinical Course
resource.description: Problem clinical course code

resource.name: Problem Priority
resource.description: Problem priority code

resource.name: Problem Type
resource.description: Problem type code

resource.name: Procedure Modifier
resource.description: Modifier codes used either to supplement information, or to adjust procedure care descriptions

resource.name: Process Client ID
resource.description: The ID of the client as recorded in the data producer or data integrator source system(s)

resource.name: Process Name
resource.description: The name of the process or service that has produced the data held in the FHIR resource or element. Example: If an IBM analytic service has been the producer, use the process-name as the name of that analytic service.

resource.name: Process Organization
resource.description: The organizing entity that owns the process that has produced the data held in the FHIR resource or element. Example: If an IBM analytic service has been the producer, set the process-organization value to IBM.

resource.name: Process Record ID
resource.description: The record ID that the data producer or data integrator uses internally to identify this data

resource.name: Process Timestamp
resource.description: The timestamp when the data was generated within the FHIR resource or element

resource.name: Process Type
resource.description: The classification type of the process that has produced the data held in either the FHIR resource or element. Example: If the process is primarily a Natural Language Processing (NLP) service, you can specify NLP as the type. Or, if the process is primarily one that aggregates and groups related items, you can specify Grouper as the type.

resource.name: Process Version
resource.description: The version of either the process or the service that has produced the data held in the FHIR resource or element

resource.name: Provider Region
resource.description: Customer-specific description of the region for the address

resource.name: Quality Measures
resource.description: Quality measures related to the FFV intitiative

resource.name: Recorder Facility
resource.description: Facility where condition was recorded

resource.name: Reengagement Display
resource.description: Communication reengagement sequence display text

resource.name: ReengagementValue
resource.description: Communication reengagement sequence value

resource.name: Reference Code
resource.description: A code describing the context of the reference

resource.name: Reference Period
resource.description: A time period in which the reference is valid

resource.name: Referral Indicator
resource.description: An indicator signifying the service resulted from a referral

resource.name: Region Code
resource.description: Customer-specific code for the geographic region of the address

resource.name: RelatedIssue
resource.description: Related issues that can be combined to fulfill a single time period for a given care gap.

resource.name: RelatedObservation
resource.description: Related observations that can be combined to fulfill a single time period for a given care gap or other measure population.

resource.name: Rx Formulary Indicator
resource.description: An indicator that the prescription drug is included in the formulary

resource.name: Rx Pay Tier
resource.description: Payment tier of the prescription drug

resource.name: Rx Supply Indicator
resource.description: An indicator of whether or not the drug claim is a medical supply (Y) or a drug (N)

resource.name: Salary Indicator
resource.description: An indicator of whether the employee status is salaried

resource.name: See Also
resource.description: References matched source entities. Links a matched resource to one or more source resources that refer the same person (patient, practitioner) or entity (location, organization).

resource.name: Sent To recipient
resource.description: Records date/time and outcome of communication attempts with the recipient

resource.name: Sent To Vendor
resource.description: Records date/time and outcome of communications sent to vendor

resource.name: Sex Assigned At Birth
resource.description: Sex assigned at birth based on observation by a physician.  Also called phenotype, or how the genes were expressed, based on the observation of the doctor. This assignment may not match the gender identity of the person, which will not be known until the newborn is older.

resource.name: SexualOrientation
resource.description: Patient's physical, romantic, and/or emotional attraction towards other people

resource.name: Snapshot Age in months
resource.description: Age in months at the time of the event

resource.name: Age In Years
resource.description: Age in years at the time of the event

resource.name: Source Data Model Version
resource.description: Version of the source system's data model, used by either the data producer or the data integrator

resource.name: Source Event Timestamp
resource.description: Date and time of the source event that triggers either the creation or updating of this FHIR resource

resource.name: Source Event Trigger
resource.description: The event that is the catalyst for creating or updating this FHIR resource

resource.name: Source File ID
resource.description: The ID for a file from which the data producer or data integrator extracted knowledge, to produce the data within this FHIR resource or element

resource.name: Source Record ID
resource.description: The ID for a record that the data producer or data integrator extracted knowledge from to produce the data within the FHIR resource or element

resource.name: Source Record Type
resource.description: Either the data model type or schema type that generates this FHIR resource

resource.name: Split Method
resource.description: Method used to identify the matched resource to split

resource.name: Stated Reason
resource.description: Recorded reason specified by the recipient.

resource.name: Status Code
resource.description: Customer-specific patient status codes

resource.name: Tenant Id
resource.description: The ID for either the client or tenant that holds the contract with the data receiver, as recorded by the data receiver. This ID must be unique to data sent on behalf of that client or tenant within the data receiver systems. The receiver systems should associate this ID to the messages that originate from this client or tenant. This supports traceability, data protection, and data isolation, when appropriate.

resource.name: Union Worker Indicator
resource.description: An indicator that the contract holder (subscriber) belongs to a union

resource.name: Dental Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has dental benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Drug Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has drug benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Hearing Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has hearing benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Medical Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has medical benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Health Data Connect PCP Responsibility Indicator
resource.description: An indicator signifying that the primary care physician is the physician considered either responsible or accountable for this claim

resource.name: Psychiatric Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has mental health and substance abuse benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Health Data Connect Record Population Count
resource.description: Specifies whether the member should be counted as eligible for the coverage period

resource.name: Health Data Connect Subscriber Relationship Code
resource.description: IBM® Health Data Connect standard code for the relationship of the member to the contract holder.

resource.name: Vision Coverage Indicator
resource.description: Indicates whether the member has vision benefit coverage: Y or N

resource.name: Adjudication Category Value Set
resource.description: Adjudication category value set for claims

resource.name: Age and Gender Group Value Set
resource.description: Standard value set for age and gender based on HEDIS cohort codes

resource.name: Age Group Value Set
resource.description: Age group value set for claims.

resource.name: Appointment Cancellation Reason Value Set
resource.description: Extended set of reasons for the cancellation of an appointment

resource.name: Attribution Codes
resource.description: Types of attribution used to associate a patient to a provider

resource.name: Attribution Product Value Set
resource.description: Products that associate a patient to a practitioner

resource.name: Attribution Source Value Set
resource.description: Sources of attribution used to associate a patient to a practitioner

resource.name: Claim Care Team Role Value Set
resource.description: Value set that defines the function of a team member within a care team

resource.name: Claim Item Detail Classification Value Set
resource.description: Item detail classification value set for claims.

resource.name: Claim Supporting Info Category Value Set
resource.description: Category that groups related types of supporting info supplied on the claim

resource.name: Claim Supporting Info Type Value Set
resource.description: Supporting information type codes for claims

resource.name: Claim Type Value Set
resource.description: IBM Health Data Connect standard value set for the coverage type under which the claim was paid

resource.name: Diagnosis Present On Admission Value Set
resource.description: The Present On Admission (POA) value set for diagnosis codes on an inpatient acute care facility Claim

resource.name: Encounter Class Value Set
resource.description: Extended class codes for encounters

resource.name: Engagement Communication Mode Value Set
resource.description: Communication modes supported for Engagement communication

resource.name: Engagement Communication Request Status Reason Value Set
resource.description: Status codes detailing the reason and status history for an Engagement communication request.

resource.name: Engagement Communication Status Reason Value Set
resource.description: Status codes detailing the reason and status history for an Engagement communication.

resource.name: Engagement Conversation Type Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating types for Engagement communications

resource.name: Engagement Opt-Out Reason Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating reasons patients may specify for opting-out of Engagement communications

resource.name: Engagement Product Value Set
resource.description: IBM Watson Health engagement products

resource.name: Er Or Observation Room Service Value Set
resource.description: Er Or Observation Room Service value set for claims

resource.name: Health Data Connect FFV Schedule Value Set
resource.description: IBM® Health Data Connect valuset defining fee for value initiative schedule codes

resource.name: Gender Identity Value Set
resource.description: Typically, gender identity codes are described in terms of masculinity and femininity. Gender identity is a social construct that varies, both across different cultures and over time. This value is often used for identity purposes, and should be collected directly from the patient.

resource.name: Identifier Type Value Set
resource.description: Extended set of identifier type codes from FHIR HL7 and extended IBM Health Data Connect Common Data Model resource identifiers

resource.name: Insurance Plan Benefit Type Value Set
resource.description: The value set that indicates the specific types of costs (admin fees, premiums, etc.) that may be tied to a member based on their Insurance plan cost category.

resource.name: Insurance Plan Cost Category Value Set
resource.description: The value set that indicates the specific benefit categories a member may have (medical, dental, vision, etc) based on benefit election.

resource.name: Insurance Plan Type Value Set
resource.description: The value set that indicates the specific benefit categories a member may have (medical, dental, vision, etc) based on benefit election.

resource.name: Legal Document Source Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating the source of legal document used for identification

resource.name: Legal Document System Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating the system of legal document used for identification

resource.name: Match Confidence Level Code System
resource.description: Codes indicating confidence level of matched entities

resource.name: Match Method Value Set
resource.description: Codes indicating methods used to identify matched entities

resource.name: Measure Population Type Value Set
resource.description: IBM Watson Health measure population types

resource.name: MS-Drg Of Payment Value Set
resource.description: The Diagnosis Related Group (MS-DRG) value set under which the claim was paid, as reported on the facility Claim

resource.name: NCPDP Dispense As Written Value Set
resource.description: The NCPDP industry standard description of how the product was dispensed.

resource.name: NDC No Hyphens Value Set
resource.description: A common set of non-hyphenated National Drug Codes listed by the FDA (Food and Drug Administration). Non-hpyhenated codes are recieved for prescription drug claims.  Hyphenated NDC codes should also be included as an additional coding, when available.

resource.name: Paid In Network Indicator Value Set
resource.description: An indicator of whether the claim was paid at the in-network or out-of-network level.

resource.name: Patient Importance Value Set
